TopicTitle: {WIP} KSP sized ASDS mod. Progress Update #1.

Articles.Content:
I went looking for a 3D model of SpaceX's ASDS on the internet. I found a reddit thread with just such a model and the poster made it clear he is ok with people making a KSP mod out of it. Im going to try my hand at converting the model. Should be easy as he already has UV unwrapped and textured it, just needs a collision mesh I think. I am familiar with the theory of using Unity and have read the tutorials. Ill start work on Monday ( if my schools lab is open, if not later). 

Renders: 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/A8ux8)

link to reddit thread:[http://www.reddit.com/r/spacex/comments/2sz0i9/asds_highish_resolution_3d_model](http://www.reddit.com/r/spacex/comments/2sz0i9/asds_highish_resolution_3d_model/)/

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-21T19:40:44Z" title="04/21/2015 07:40  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 21, 2015</time> by DarthVader**

first question before i get started. using the .obj (in the reddit thread) if i put that in unitys assets folder, will it load fully textured, UV'd and with proper materials set up and just need a collision mesh?

Progress Update #1: Still not given access to computer lab, might have to think of a backup plan. Renders of the Model (from the Reddit Thread) have been added to the OP. Once I get unity set up I might reduce the numbers of junk on deck to reduce the poly count.

Since there's been no progress on this page, I though I'd just leave [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/136712-SpaceX-Autonomous-SpacePort-Drone-Ship-%28ASDS%29-1-0-4?p=2244262#post2244262) right here....
Neat, was just going to post about that. We could offer two complementary ships, one with lower rez (yours) and a high rez version (the model I found) for people with different computers.

^^

Kewl..Variety is ALWAYS a good thing... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
